name: Publish Manager
description:
You have one year to publish as many papers as possible. Increase your output rate by hiring new researchers and improving their writing efficiency. But make sure that the quality of your publications does not suffer. Scandals lower your acceptance rate.

You'll find all necessary functions in the left panel. Execute functions by clicking on them. Variables in the right panel indicate your performance.

Have fun.

Sound Effects: freesound.org (License)
